title: DeFi Fundamentals
description: Understanding Decentralized Finance concepts, protocols, and applications.

questions.question: What does DeFi stand for?
questions.explanation: DeFi stands for Decentralized Finance, referring to financial services built on blockchain.

questions.question: What is a DEX?
questions.explanation: DEX stands for Decentralized Exchange, allowing peer-to-peer trading without intermediaries.

questions.question: What is yield farming in DeFi?
options: Earning rewards by providing liquidity to DeFi protocols
questions.explanation: Yield farming involves earning rewards by providing liquidity to DeFi protocols.

questions.question: What is impermanent loss?
options: Temporary loss when providing liquidity to AMMs
Loss due to smart contract bugs
questions.explanation: Impermanent loss occurs when providing liquidity to AMMs due to price changes of paired assets.

questions.question: DeFi protocols eliminate the need for traditional financial intermediaries.
questions.explanation: DeFi protocols aim to eliminate traditional financial intermediaries through smart contracts.
